briefTitle: Dextromethorphan as a Novel Non-opioid Adjunctive Agent for Pain Control in Medication Abortion
officialTitle: Dextromethorphan as a Novel Non-opioid Adjunctive Agent for Pain Control in Medication Abortion: a Randomized Controlled Trial

interventions.name: Avicel PH101 (Microcrystalline Cellulose NF) for Compounding

summary: This study evaluates dextromethorphan as a non-opioid adjunctive medication for pain control during medication abortion. This is double-blinded, four-arm randomized controlled trial enrolling 156 women over a period of 9-12 months: Receiving narcotics+dextromethorphan, narcotics and placebo (microcrystalline cellulose), no narcotics and dextromethorphan and no narcotics and placebo (microcrystalline cellulose).

primaryOutcome.measure: Worst Pain Measurement Via Numeric Rating Scale (NRS-11)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Over 24 hours starting from misoprostol administration
